thread.title: Fox casting for 'MasterChef Junior' in Boston
thread.title_full: Fox casting for 'MasterChef Junior' in Boston

author: Dana Barbuto The Patriot Ledger
title: Fox casting for 'MasterChef Junior' in Boston
text: Fox casting for ‘MasterChef Junior’ in Boston Comment By Dana BarbutoThe Patriot Ledger Posted Oct. 21, 2015 at 12:55 pm Updated at 1:06 PM Calling all future foodies. Fox’s “MasterChef Junior” is holding an open call for young contestants in Boston Nov. 14. Children who are between the ages of 8 and 13 years old as of April 1, 2016 are eligible to audition for the cooking competition television series in which 24 young chefs compete to win $100,000. The show starts its fourth season at 8 p.m. Nov. 6 on Fox. Featuring chef Gordon Ramsay of “Hell’s Kitchen” fame, “MasterChef Junior” has pint-sized cooks competing in a variety of cooking challenges. Along with Ramsay, judges are chefs Christina Tosi and Graham Elliot. The casting call takes place from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. Saturday, Nov. 14 at the Hyatt Regency, 1 Ave de Lafayette, Boston. Children need to be accompanied by a legal guardian. Bring an apron for your child. The casting team will provide the food and the equipment. Dana Barbuto may be reached at dbarbuto@ledger.com or follow her on Twitter @dbarbuto_Ledger.
